'''Interlude Chapter''' is the [[Archon Quest]] chapter containing acts that are unrelated to each other and instead follow up on the quests that unlock the respective act.

==List of Acts==
* Act I - [[The Crane Returns on the Wind]]
** Requirements: {{Quest|28;A New Star Approaches|requirements=1}}.
* Act II - [[Perilous Trail]]
** Requirements: {{Quest|40;A New Star Approaches;Transient Dreams;Rise Up, Golden Soul;Wherefore Did the Spiritstone Descend?;A Teapot to Call Home: Part I|display=bullet|requirements=1}}
* Act III - [[Inversion of Genesis]]
** Requirements: {{Quest|40;Akasha Pulses, the Kalpa Flame Rises;A Strange and Friendless Road|display=bullet|requirements=1}}
* Act IV - [[Paralogism]]
** Requirements: TBA
